activities.name: Copy data for each table in lookup
Extract data to Parquet in BLOB Storage

oracleReaderQuery.value:
select DISTINCT(OBJECT_NAME)
from ALL_OBJECTS 
WHERE OBJECT_NAME 
IN (
'DLV_PHYS_JOIN_LOCATION_VW'
,'DLV_PHYS_JOIN_PFOLIO_VW'
,'DLV_PHYS_PROF_KEY_DBF'
)
@concat('select ceil((select count(*) from ',variables('tableName'),')/8000000) as group_no from dual')

@concat('select
CASE
  WHEN grp_nbr = 1
  THEN min(ora_rowscn)
  WHEN grp_nbr > 1
  THEN min(ora_rowscn) +1
  END as Starting_Value
, max(ora_rowscn) as Ending_Value
, count(*)        as Total_Records
, grp_nbr         as Group_Nbr
from (
select ora_rowscn,
ntile(',variables('numberOfGroups') ,') over (order by ora_rowscn) grp_nbr
from ',variables('tableName') ,'
)
group by grp_nbr
ORDER BY grp_nbr ASC')
@concat('SELECT /*+ NO_PARALLEL("', variables('tableName'),'") */  * FROM ',variables('tableName'),' WHERE ORA_ROWSCN BETWEEN ', item().STARTING_VALUE, ' AND ',item().ENDING_VALUE)

)

ORDER BY grp_nbr ASC')

query.value:
@concat('select 
LAST_RUN_TIMESTAMP,
LAST_RUN_CLOSING
from SHARED.EXTR_LAST_RUN_INFO
WHERE JOB_NAME = ''',pipeline().Pipeline,'''')

value.value:
@if(
equals(activity('Select last run information').output.value[0].LAST_RUN_TIMESTAMP,NULL)
,NULL
,formatDateTime(activity('Select last run information').output.value[0].LAST_RUN_TIMESTAMP,'yyyy-MM-dd HH-mm-ss'))

activities.name: Copy data for each SCN group
Extract data to Parquet in BLOB Storage

oracleReaderQuery.value:
@concat(
'select
CASE
WHEN grp_nbr = 1
THEN min(ora_rowscn)
WHEN grp_nbr > 1
THEN min(ora_rowscn) +1
END as Starting_Value
,   max(ora_rowscn) as Ending_Value
,   count(*)        as Total_Records
,   grp_nbr         as Group_Nbr
from (
select ora_rowscn,
ntile(8) over (order by ora_rowscn) grp_nbr
from ', 
variables('table'), 
' where m_ref_data in (select d.m_ref_data from DYN_AUDIT_REP d, JOB_AUDIT_REP j where d.m_idjob=j.m_mx_ref_job and d.M_DELETED  = ''N'' and j.M_STATUS in  (''Done'',''Corrected'') and  to_char(to_date(TO_CHAR (d.M_DATEGEN, ''DDMMYYYY'')|| ''_'' || TO_CHAR (d.M_TIMEGEN),''DDMMYYYY SSSSS''),''YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MI-SS'') >''',
variables('lastRunTimestamp'), 
''' and  to_char(to_date(TO_CHAR (d.M_DATEGEN, ''DDMMYYYY'')|| ''_''|| TO_CHAR (d.M_TIMEGEN),''DDMMYYYY SSSSS''),''YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MI-SS'') <= ''', formatDateTime(variables('extractionTimestamp'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH-mm-ss'), ''')
)
group by grp_nbr
ORDER BY grp_nbr ASC'
)
@concat('select ceil((select count(*) from ',variables('tableName'),')/8000000) as group_no from dual')

@concat('select
CASE
  WHEN grp_nbr = 1
  THEN min(ora_rowscn)
  WHEN grp_nbr > 1
  THEN min(ora_rowscn) +1
  END as Starting_Value
, max(ora_rowscn) as Ending_Value
, count(*)        as Total_Records
, grp_nbr         as Group_Nbr
from (
select ora_rowscn,
ntile(',variables('numberOfGroups') ,') over (order by ora_rowscn) grp_nbr
from ',variables('tableName') ,'
)
group by grp_nbr
ORDER BY grp_nbr ASC')
@concat('SELECT /*+ NO_PARALLEL("', variables('tableName'),'") */  * FROM ',variables('tableName'),' WHERE ORA_ROWSCN BETWEEN ', item().STARTING_VALUE, ' AND ',item().ENDING_VALUE)

,NULL
,formatDateTime(activity('Select last run information').output.value[0].LAST_RUN_TIMESTAMP,'yyyy-MM-dd HH-mm-ss'))

source.oracleReaderQuery:
select OBJECT_NAME from ALL_OBJECTS WHERE OBJECT_NAME IN (
'ALPIQ_ACT_LSWAP_REP'
,'ALPIQ_DELTA_EXPO_REP'
,'ALPIQ_DLT_EXP_FX_REP'
,'ALPIQ_MTM_LSWAP_VW'
,'ATEL_CMAT_REP'
,'ATEL_CS_ACT_PROV_REP'
,'ATEL_SQL_TP_REP'
,'CS_ACTUALS_CER_REP')
AND OWNER = 'MX_DATAMART'
AND OBJECT_TYPE = 'TABLE'

'select * from ',

)

source.oracleReaderQuery:
select DISTINCT(OBJECT_NAME) from ALL_OBJECTS WHERE OBJECT_NAME IN(
'ALPIQ_LOCATION_COUNTRY_VIEW'
,'V_STRATEGY_TREE_DBF'
,'V_TRN_FLAGS_DBF'
)

select DISTINCT(OBJECT_NAME) from ALL_OBJECTS WHERE OBJECT_NAME IN (
'ALPIQ_MASTER_AGR_REP'
,'ALPIQ_SIM_PURGED_REP'
,'ALPIQ_SIM_STOCK_REP'
,'ATEL_CMAT_REP'
,'ATEL_CS_ACTUALS_REP'
,'ATEL_CS_FORECAST_REP'
,'ATEL_MDL_FX_REP'
,'ATEL_OPTIONS_REP'
,'ATEL_SIM_OPT_GRK_REP'
,'ATEL_SQL_CNTP_REP'
,'ATEL_SQL_FEE_REP'
,'ATEL_SQL_INDEX_REP'
,'ATEL_SQL_PFTREE_REP'
,'ATEL_SQL_PF_REP'
,'ATEL_SQL_PR_IND_REP'
)

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT * from ', variables('dbSchema'), '.', item().OBJECT_NAME, ' where m_ref_data in (select d.m_ref_data from DYN_AUDIT_REP d, JOB_AUDIT_REP j where d.m_idjob=j.m_mx_ref_job and d.M_DELETED  = ''N'' and j.M_STATUS in  (''Done'',''Corrected'') and  to_char(to_date(TO_CHAR (d.M_DATEGEN, ''DDMMYYYY'')|| ''_''|| TO_CHAR (d.M_TIMEGEN),''DDMMYYYY SSSSS''),''YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MI-SS'') >', '''',variables('lastRunTimestamp'),  '''', ' and  to_char(to_date(TO_CHAR (d.M_DATEGEN, ''DDMMYYYY'')|| ''_''|| TO_CHAR (d.M_TIMEGEN),''DDMMYYYY SSSSS''),''YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MI-SS'') <= ', '''',variables('folderTimestamp'),''')')
@concat('SELECT * from ', variables('dbSchema'), '.', item().OBJECT_NAME, ' where closing_date > to_date(''', string(variables('lastRunClosing')),''',''DD.MM.YYYY'')')

activities.name: Extract data to Parquet in BLOB Storage

oracleReaderQuery.value:
@concat(
'select
CASE
WHEN grp_nbr = 1
THEN min(ora_rowscn)
WHEN grp_nbr > 1
THEN min(ora_rowscn) +1
END as Starting_Value
,   max(ora_rowscn) as Ending_Value
,   count(*)        as Total_Records
,   grp_nbr         as Group_Nbr
from (
select ora_rowscn,
ntile(4) over (order by ora_rowscn) grp_nbr
from ', 
variables('table'), 
' where m_ref_data in (select d.m_ref_data from DYN_AUDIT_REP d, JOB_AUDIT_REP j where d.m_idjob=j.m_mx_ref_job and d.M_DELETED  = ''N'' and j.M_STATUS in  (''Done'',''Corrected'') and  to_char(to_date(TO_CHAR (d.M_DATEGEN, ''DDMMYYYY'')|| ''_'' || TO_CHAR (d.M_TIMEGEN),''DDMMYYYY SSSSS''),''YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MI-SS'') >''',
variables('lastRunTimestamp'), 
''' and  to_char(to_date(TO_CHAR (d.M_DATEGEN, ''DDMMYYYY'')|| ''_''|| TO_CHAR (d.M_TIMEGEN),''DDMMYYYY SSSSS''),''YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MI-SS'') <= ''', formatDateTime(variables('extractionTimestamp'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH-mm-ss'), ''')
)
group by grp_nbr
ORDER BY grp_nbr ASC'
)

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT * from ', variables('dbSchema'), '.', item().OBJECT_NAME, ' where m_ref_data in (select d.m_ref_data from DYN_AUDIT_REP d, JOB_AUDIT_REP j where d.m_idjob=j.m_mx_ref_job and d.M_DELETED  = ''N'' and j.M_STATUS in  (''Done'',''Corrected'') and  to_char(to_date(TO_CHAR (d.M_DATEGEN, ''DDMMYYYY'')|| ''_''|| TO_CHAR (d.M_TIMEGEN),''DDMMYYYY SSSSS''),''YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MI-SS'') >', '''',variables('lastRunTimestamp'),  '''', ' and  to_char(to_date(TO_CHAR (d.M_DATEGEN, ''DDMMYYYY'')|| ''_''|| TO_CHAR (d.M_TIMEGEN),''DDMMYYYY SSSSS''),''YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MI-SS'') <= ', '''',variables('folderTimestamp'),''')')
@concat('SELECT * from ', variables('dbSchema'), '.', item().OBJECT_NAME, ' where closing_date > to_date(''', string(variables('lastRunClosing')),''',''DD.MM.YYYY'')')

activities.name: Copy data for each table in Lookup
Extract data to Parquet in BLOB Storage

oracleReaderQuery.value:
select DISTINCT(OBJECT_NAME) from ALL_OBJECTS WHERE OBJECT_NAME IN (
'ACT_PHYS_DBF'
,'ALPIQ_CLOSING_DATE_VIEW'
,'CAL_HOL_DBF'
,'CM_LOCAT_DBF'
,'CM_PROF_PB_DBF'

query.value:
@concat('select 
LAST_RUN_TIMESTAMP,
LAST_RUN_CLOSING
from SHARED.EXTR_LAST_RUN_INFO
WHERE JOB_NAME = ''',pipeline().Pipeline,'''')

value.value:
@if(
equals(activity('Select last run information').output.value[0].LAST_RUN_TIMESTAMP,NULL)
,NULL
,formatDateTime(activity('Select last run information').output.value[0].LAST_RUN_TIMESTAMP,'yyyy-MM-dd HH-mm-ss'))

activities.name: Extract data to Parquet in BLOB Storage

oracleReaderQuery.value:
@concat(
'select
CASE
WHEN grp_nbr = 1
THEN min(ora_rowscn)
WHEN grp_nbr > 1
THEN min(ora_rowscn) +1
END as Starting_Value
,   max(ora_rowscn) as Ending_Value
,   count(*)        as Total_Records
,   grp_nbr         as Group_Nbr
from (
select ora_rowscn,
ntile(4) over (order by ora_rowscn) grp_nbr
from ', 
variables('table'), 
' where m_ref_data in (select d.m_ref_data from DYN_AUDIT_REP d, JOB_AUDIT_REP j where d.m_idjob=j.m_mx_ref_job and d.M_DELETED  = ''N'' and j.M_STATUS in  (''Done'',''Corrected'') and  to_char(to_date(TO_CHAR (d.M_DATEGEN, ''DDMMYYYY'')|| ''_'' || TO_CHAR (d.M_TIMEGEN),''DDMMYYYY SSSSS''),''YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MI-SS'') >''',
variables('lastRunTimestamp'), 
''' and  to_char(to_date(TO_CHAR (d.M_DATEGEN, ''DDMMYYYY'')|| ''_''|| TO_CHAR (d.M_TIMEGEN),''DDMMYYYY SSSSS''),''YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MI-SS'') <= ''', formatDateTime(variables('extractionTimestamp'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH-mm-ss'), ''')
)
group by grp_nbr
ORDER BY grp_nbr ASC'
)
